column1: Smoque BBQ////We ordered up a brisket platter with two sides of mac n cheese (I mean really
column2: how do you not get down with their mac n cheese)
column3: a half slab of st louis ribs
column4: and an order of brisket chilli. Well
column5: all of the food got demolished when we got back (along with some of the food getting picked at in the car as well). The brisket was insanely tender and was falling apart left and right. The ribs were very good
column6: but the chilli was awesome and the mac n cheese got inhaled
